description:
German Language Learning from the beginning.

By finishing A1.1 plus A1.2, you will be able to pass A1 exam by Goethe Institute.

There is no materials required at all just your attention and study.

It takes 5 condensed Hours teaching and you will have to study about 15 hours to finish it well.

The course is structured systematically by lectures and training and we provide handout for all lessons.

Anyone who like Germany and German or Anyone want to use German for some purposes (traveling, Education,..etc) you can find what you want here.
title: German Course A1.1
